name: Lucidity Consulting Group
overview:
Lucidity Consulting Group, LP provides business and technology consulting services. The companyâ€™s solutions include Oracle e-Business Suite for project-based businesses, JD Edwards EnterpriseOne for wholesale distribution; Hyperion Enterprise Performance Management Suite; Siebel CRM; Demantra Demand Planning software; and Oracle Transportation Management solutions. It also offers services in the areas of support and post production, data warehousing, managed services, hosting, business intelligence, and master data management. In addition, the company operates as a certified reseller of Oracle Applications and a certified Oracle Accelerate partner. It serves industrial products, utilities, industrial distribution and repair, consumer packaged goods, professional services, process industries, financial, healthcare, and retail industries.

Lucidity Consulting Group, LP was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Richardson, Texas.
